Key Match Events: Tyrese Maxey scored the go-ahead basket with 23.7 seconds left
Guerschon Yabusele blocked a potential tying layup with 14 seconds left to preserve the win for the Sixers
Pre-Game Insights: The 76ers played without Joel Embiid, Paul George, Kyle Lowry, and Andre Drummond
The Wizards played without leading scorer Jordan Poole and Malcolm Brogdon
Post-Match Reflections: Maxey, an All-Star last season, struggled at times as the go-to scorer this season with Embiid and George out so often
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tickets on the secondary market were going for less than $10 each in the lower 100 level right before tipoff
The Wizards have lost four straight games and six of seven, and have the worst record in the NBA at 6-29
Others: The game was played at the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia
Jared Butler scored 26 points for the Wizards and Corey Kispert had 23
